extension.summary: Unofficial Spotify music plugin for Kodi
extension.description: Allows you to use your Spotify premium account to connect and play Spotify through Kodi. After installing, use 'Configure' to enter your Spotify username and password.
extension.disclaimer: This product uses the SPOTIFY WEB API but is not endorsed, certified or otherwise approved in any way by Spotify. Spotify is the registered trademark of Spotify AB.
extension.news: v1.3.9 (2023-12-19) Added Spanish translations. (Thanks trihy.) 1.3.8: Added setting to turn off Spotify normalization. Should make tracks play louder.
